text: One Crazy Summer is a 1986 American romantic comedy movie directed by Savage Steve Holland and starring John Cusack, Demi Moore, Bobcat Goldthwait, Curtis Armstrong, Joel Murray, William Hickey, Jeremy Piven, Taylor Negron. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Savage Steve Holland
title: One Crazy Summer
